{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pokémon Tower |image = [[File:Pokemon Tower.png]] |caption = An overhead map of the Pokémon Tower. |tokens = 750 |location = West of Lavender Town }} The '''Pokémon Tower''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. == Random Encounters == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Encounter !!
